name: Agamaggan
effect:
Monster Hero Required

Smash

When Agamaggan deals combat damage to an exhausted ally, ready Agamaggan.

(3) → Exhaust target ally.
The indomitable boar ancient slew thousands of demons in his charge on Azshara's palace.

name: Ahul Moonspeaker
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
"From full moon to new moon, Mu'sha's power is ever-changing."

name: Alpha Prime
effect:
When Alpha Prime enters play, put a 2 / 2 Worgen ally token into play for this and each other Night Elf ally you control.

This and other Worgen allies you control have Aberration.
Ralaar Fangfire, also known as Alpha Prime, is the leader of the Druids of the Scythe.

name: Ancient Bear Form
effect:
Ongoing: Your hero has Protector.

Your hero has +5 for each five resources you control.
Fledgling druids learn much from stories of the twin bear ancients Ursoc and Ursol and their battles against the Burning Legion.

name: Ansem, Timewalker Deathblade
effect:
Protector

This ally has +4 / +3 while an opponent controls a or Monster hero.
"If I cannot undo my fate, I'll let no enemy undo his."

name: Arathar, the Eye of Flame
effect:
Long-Range

When this weapon enters play, it has +2 ATK this turn.
Never blinking, ever burning.

name: Arcane Potency
effect:
Arcane Talent

Ongoing: This ability enters play exhausted.

This ability can be exhausted to pay the cost of abilities as though it were a resource.

name: Arcane Unraveling
effect: Interrupt target ability and remove it from the game. If a non-Ongoing ability is removed from the game this way, you may play it immediately without paying it's cost.
"Learning to weave spells was easy. Learning to unravel them was a bit trickier." - Belmaril, Timewalker Bloodmage

name: Archival Purposes
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Take this vessel with you as you silence these echoes. A portion of their energies will be archived within the Bronze Dragonflight's depository." - Alurmi

name: Arrowstorm
effect: Your hero deals 4 ranged damage to target opposing ally with cost 4 or more.
You can hit some of the people with some of the arrows all of the time.

name: Aviana the Reborn
effect:
Elusive

→ Another target Monster ally you control has Assault 2 and Smash this turn.

→ Another target Monster ally you control has Protector this turn.
"I am the mistress of the skies, and all who threaten my children shall suffer."

name: Axe of Cenarius
effect: When you strike with this weapon, your hero and this weapon can't ready during your next ready step.
Fashioned by Malfurion Stormrage under the direction of Cenarius, time-lost orc Broxigar the Red used it to slay countless demons.

name: Axe of the Tauren Chieftains
effect: "My father once made a promise to the horde, to repay a debt we owed them for their service to our race. I, for one, intend to deliver on that promise." - Baine Bloodhoof

name: Azgalor the Pit Lord
effect:
Smash

When this ally enters play, you may choose and destroy any number of other allies you control. If you do, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand for each ally destroyed this way.
"Suffer, you despicable insect!"

name: Azzinoth
effect:
Other Demon allies you control can protect Azzinoth.

When another Demon ally you control is destroyed, Azzinoth deals 2 shadow damage to target opposing hero and heals 2 damage from your hero.
The original wielder of Illidan's demonic warglaives.

name: Baine, Son of Cairne
effect:
Protector

War Stomp

When an opposing hero or ally is exhausted by War Stomp, Baine deals 4 melee damage to it.

name: Bear Trap
effect:
Trap

Remove target opposing attacking ally from combat. Draw a card.
Note: Not just for bears.

name: Beast Mastery
effect:
Beast Mastery Talent

Choose one of the following:

Rotund Rhino: Put a 2 / 5 Rhinoceros Beast Monster ally token into play with Protector, Spellshield

name: Belmaril, Timewalker Bloodmage
effect: At the start of your turn, you may put a token copy of another target ally you control into play.
"Infinite possibilities, infinite versions of yourself ... no wonder this place must be protected."

name: Beyond the Grave
effect:
Remove target opponent's graveyard from the game.

For each ally removed this way, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.

For each ability removed this way, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to that opponent's hero and heals 2 damage from itself.

For each equipment removed this way, put the top three cards of that opponent's deck into his graveyard.

name: Bhenn Checks-the-Sky
effect: When this ally enters play, you may exhaust target ally.
"Much has changed in recent times, but I will always follow my Chieftain."

name: Blazing Infernal
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to each other ally.

name: Blessing of Vigilance
effect:
Attach to target ally you control.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 and Protector.
"This is not the time to start jumping at shadows. We must remain calm and vigilant." - Tirion Fordring

name: Blind Rage
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 / +3, attacks opposing hero and allies at random, and must attack each turn if able.
"I don't care who that maniac hits as long as it isn't me!" - Garyk Stormcrier

name: Blitz
effect: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target hero or ally.
"If there's no time to cast a spell, well, you're carrying a big stick, aren't you?" - Zarim Redskull

name: Blood and Thunder!
effect: Put two 2 / 2 Orc Warrior ally tokens into play with Ferocity and "This ally can attack only heroes."

name: Bloodsoul
effect: This ally can attack only heroes.
"Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance."

name: Bloodthirsty Shout
effect: Heroes and allies you control have +2 ATK this turn.
"No mercy! No quarter! No survivors!"

name: Bolin Moonflare
effect: When another Night Elf ally enters play under your control, this ally deals fire damage to target opposing hero equal to that ally's cost.
"Feed the flames wherever you find them, especially in the hearts of your allies."

name: Burn Away
effect: Destroy target ability.
Some impurities cannot be cured with the medicine of mortals - only the Light can burn them away.

name: Call the Void
effect: Put target Demon ally from your graveyard into your hand.
"You're finished when I say you're finished!" - Soulrender Keldah

name: Child of Agamaggan
effect:
Monster Hero Required

Smash
"You can be a big pig, too." - Makuna Hatada, tauren druid

name: Child of Aviana
effect: Monster heroes can protect this ally.
Swift and ruthless, Aviana personifies the capricious nature of the winds, and her children are no different.

name: Child of Goldrinn
effect:
Ferocity

Stealth
"I witnessed one of the Wolf Ancient's sons battling the Firelord's minions on the peaks of Hyjal. His savagery ... was awe-inspiring." - Ian Duran

name: Child of Tortolla
effect:
Monster Hero Required

Protector, Spellshield
The children of the turtle ancient grow incredibly resilient shells over time.

name: Child of Ursoc
effect: Assault 3
The descendants of Ursoc the Mighty possess their patron's stubborness and tenacity.

name: Child of Ursol
effect: Mend 1
"Why are you laughing? I just said that because they're the children of Ursol the Wise, they're smarter than the average bear." - Toho Bloomhorn

name: Combat Stance
effect:
Ongoing: You can't play cards other than allies and Stances, and you can't complete quests.

Each ally you control has Assault X, where X is its cost.
Tunnel vision won't help you win wars, but it might help you win battles.

name: Conjure Elementals
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may pay (2). If you do, put a 2 / 2 Water Elemental ally token into play. Otherwise, destroy this ability.
Gives "making friends" a whole new meaning.

name: Corrupted Furbolg
effect: This ally has -1 / -1 for each card in opposing graveyards.
"The Deadwood tribe is evil, but it is the effect of the fel that pollute their minds." - Nafien of the Timbermaw

name: Crescent Wand
effect: If you have 100 or more cards in your deck: (3), → Put a 10 / 10 Echo of Tyrande Monster ally token into play.
"Mother moon, guide my hand; allow me to bring rest to these misbegotten souls." - Echo of Tyrande

name: Crusader's Might
effect: This turn, your hero has +ATK equal to the combined of armor you control.
"Let the light be your hammer as well as your shield." - Alundra, Sin'dorei Timewalker

name: Crushing Death
effect: Destroy target equipment with cost less than or equal to the number of cards in it's controller's graveyard.
"I defeated mortality - what hope have mere weapons and armor?"

name: Darkshire Deathsworn
effect: Protector
"I may have lost my life, but my loyalty to my king remains."

name: Darlon Blacksoul
effect: Unity: When this ally enters play, if you control three or more Human allies, you may put target opposing ally into it's owner's hand.
"The crown is willing to look the other way as long as we act in it's best interests."

name: Darnassus Mooncaller
effect: Haste 2
"Elune lights our path and guides our hand."

name: Darnassus Shadowblade
effect: Night Elf allies you control have Stealth.
"Hiding alone in the shadows is child's play. Let me know when you can do it with an entire battalion."

name: Darnassus Tabard
effect: (3) → Target ally has +2 ATK this turn. You pay (1) less to use this power for each Night Elf ally you control.
"Ishnu-alah, friend."
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Darnassus Warrior
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 melee damage to target hero.
"Sever a demon's arm, and it'll stop swinging. Sever the head, and everything else stops, too."

name: Dawnhoof Brightcaller
effect: Fighting a tauren is difficult enough without the Light on his side.

name: Death's Decree
effect:
Destroy target ally.

Put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
A battlefield provides a nearly inexhaustible resource for death knights.

name: Decimate
effect: Destroy up to two target equipment.
"Whatever hellish blacksmith built your equipment needs to hone his craft a bit more, demon!"

name: Delinar Silvershot
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control another Night Elf ally, this ally deals 3 ranged damage to target opposing ally.
A good way to tell you're outnumbered while fighting night elves is if you only see one.

name: Demon Hunter's Aspect
effect: Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking heroes, or +2 ATK while attacking Demon heroes.
Demon hunters gain their powers through painful rituals and intense training.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Demonic Infusion
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 / -1, loses all races, and becomes a Monster Demon.
It's nowhere near as painful as it looks. It's much, much worse.

name: Despair of Winter
effect: Destroy all allies.
"Who would've thought that beings from burning hell-worlds would have such a tough time with frost magic?" - Ansem, Timewalker Deathblade

name: Devious Dismantle
effect: Destroy target equipment. If you destroyed an equipment with cost 4 or less this way, its controller discards a card.
"Now, you were saying?"

name: Divinity
effect:
Protection Talent

Your hero heals 5 damage from itself. That amount is doubled for each other card named Divinity in your graveyard.

While there are four copies of Divinity in your graveyard, your hero has 100 .

name: Documenting the Timeways
effect:
You pay (1) less to complete this quest for each five cards in your graveyard. Pay (5) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"You assisted with our archival in the past. Well, technically it was the future, but I believe you understand." - Alurmi

name: Drom'kor, Timewalker Necrolyte
effect: If this ally would be destroyed, you may remove three Orc allies in your graveyard from the game. If you do, exhaust this ally and remove all damage from him instead.
"I could use the timeways to cheat death, but why bother when there are more elegant ways?"

name: Dungard Ironcutter
effect:
Protector

(1) → This ally has +2 ATK this turn.

(1) → Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to this ally this turn.

At the end of your turn, ready this ally.
Dungard was the spokesman of the Earthen during the War of the Ancients.

name: Durotar Flamecaster
effect: "Heat! If there's one thing I understand from living in Orgrimmar, it's heat!"

name: Durotar Frostblade
effect: "Not even the blistering sun of Durotar can prevail over the chill of the grave."

name: Earthen Crusher
effect: (1) → This ally has +1 ATK this turn.
Dungard Ironcutter enlisted his earthen brethren to aid the night elves against the Burning Legion.

name: Ebon Plague
effect:
Unholy Talent

Attach to target hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put the top card of attached hero's controller's deck into his graveyard. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment, put a number of additional cards into his graveyard equal to that card's cost.

name: Eldre'Thalas Sorceress
effect:
Haste 3

When this ally enters play, draw a card.
"We Highborne returned to our brothers and sisters with knowledge to spare."

name: Elemental Echo
effect:
Attach to target ally you control.

Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage to a defending hero, put a token copy of that ally into play exhausted.
"Cry out to the elements, and you may hear their voice in the echo."

name: Elemental Purge
effect: Destroy target ability. If you do, your hero deals 3 nature damage to that ability's controller's hero.
"Your enchantments are nothing more than targets painted on you."

name: Ellen Burroughs
effect: When this ally enters play, opposing allies and lose Elusive and Spellshield
"It's a deadly mistake, confusing 'invisible' with 'untouchable.'"

name: Elune's Blessing
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 / +3.
"Let the light of Elune bring you strength and wisdom in these troubled times."

name: Elysa Lockewood
effect: When this ally enters play, you may put target ally with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into your hand.
"My father fought side by side with Uther, protecting those who couldn't protect themselves. I vowed to do the same."

name: Endure
effect:
Play this ability only if your hero has 5 or less remaining health.

Ongoing: → Remove your hero from combat.

→ Interrupt target ability that's targeting your hero.
"Remember that, above all else, your mission cannot be completed if you fail." - Ashley Blank, Hunter Trainer

name: Euphoria
effect:
Balance Talent

Ongoing: → Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's cost is 4 or more, add a bliss counter to this ability.

While there are three or more bliss counters on this ability, you pay (4) less to play cards.

name: Eye of the Legion
effect: (1) → Look at a random card in target opponent's hand.

name: Feldrake
effect: When you place a resource face up into your resource row, this ally may deal 2 shadow damage to target hero. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
Not even dragons are immune to the corruption of fel magic.

name: Felguard Marauder
effect: "Conscripted from the mo'arg race, these warriors serve as the Legion's rank and file soldiers." - Exodar Holographic Emitter

name: Festering Disease
effect:
Attach to target opposing hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put the top card of attached hero's controller's deck into his graveyard. If it's an ally, your hero heals 1 damage from itself.
"Demons can be just as susceptible to disease and decay as we are. Use this to your advantage." - Ian Barus

name: Fimlet Sparklight
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 8 damage from each hero.
The voices of the faithful are equal before the Light.

name: Firestorm
effect: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each ally.
"In the heat of battle, it's folly to assume your flames will be able to tell friend from foe." - Belmaril, Timewalker Bloodmage

name: Focused Heal
effect: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Frenzied Felhound
effect: When this ally enters play, it may deal 1 shadow damage to target ally.
Even seasoned warlocks find the completely alien nature of felhounds unsettling.

name: Frenzyfin
effect: At the start of your turn, you may search your deck for a Murloc ally and put it into play.
"I know the murlocs sound like they're just gurgling, but they're speaking a real language. 'Ggmmmlmrmrgmg' means 'murloc', for example." - Nat Pagle's Field Guide to Aquatic Life

name: Frigid Frailty
effect: Target ally has 0 ATK and can't gain ATK this turn.
"Yes, now you're just as helpless as the innocents you once trampled underfoot." - Ansem, Timewalker Deathblade

name: Furbolg Avenger
effect: While you have six or more cards in your graveyard, this ally has +4 and Protector.
"I underestimated the furbolgs. Their devotion to their tribe is as strong as a tauren's." - Toho Bloomhorn

name: Furbolg Chieftain
effect: While you have eight or more cards in your graveyard, prevent all damage that attacking allies would deal to this ally.
"Want to know the difference between a cornered bear and a cornered furbolg? Nothing." - Overheard in Everlook, Winterspring

name: Furbolg Firecaller
effect: While you have four or more cards in your graveyard, this ally has Assault 2 and Smash.
Shamanism is the spiritual practice of choice for the furbolg tribes of Azeroth.

name: Furious George
effect:
When this ally defends, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment with an even cost, remove this ally from combat. Put that revealed card on the bottom of your deck.

→ This ally deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

name: Gaktai
effect: When this ally enters play, you may put 2 damage on your hero. If you do, draw a card.
"What's in it for me?"

name: Gale Force
effect: Target ally has Ferocity this turn.
"Never enter into a footrace with a shaman." - Barador, Wildhammer Timewalker

name: Garrosh, Son of Grom
effect:
Ferocity

Garrosh can attack only heroes.

At the start of your turn, for this and each other Orc ally you control, put a 2 / 2 Orc Warrior ally token into play with Ferocity and "This ally can attack only heroes."
"Hellscream's eyes are upon you."

name: Garyk Stormcrier
effect: When this ally deals combat damage to an opposing hero, Orc allies you control have Ferocity this turn. (This also affects Orc allies that enter play later this turn.)
"A true orc needs no demon blood to overcome his foes!"

name: Gavel of Peroth'arn
effect: When you play an ally with cost equal to the number of resources you control, you pay (3) less to strike with this weapon this turn.
"The hunter became the hunted." - Illidan Stormrage

name: Gifted Heal
effect: Your hero heals 4 damage from itself. Then, if your hero is undamaged, draw a card.
"We must all be at our best if we're to prevail against the Legion."

name: Girdle of the Queen's Champion
effect: This armor enters play exhausted.
"I pray that the Light of a Thousand Moons will grant me this honor." - Enchanted Magus

name: Glory to the Alliance!
effect: Put two 1 / 1 Human Warrior ally tokens into play with Protector.

name: Goldrinn
effect:
Ferocity, Stealth

Once per turn: Howl or Growl → If an opposing hero was dealt 10 or more damage this turn, put five 1 / 1 Wolf Beast Monster ally tokens into play.
"He feared no demon. He would wade into their ranks, fangs bared and spattered with their vile ichor ..." - Takrik Ragehowl

name: Grand Marshal's Tome of Power
effect: (2), → Allies you control have Assault 1 while in combat with heroes this turn, or Assault 2 if in combat with heroes.
attributes: • Class: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

name: Guardian of the Light
effect:
Play only if an opponent hero or ally is attacking.

Put a 5 / 5 Guardian ally token into play with Protector and "At end of turn, destroy this ally."
"It came to my aid when the orc's blade was at my throat, then vanished as quickly as it had appeared." - Overheard in the Cathedral of Light

name: Guardian Spirit
effect:
Holy Talent

Your hero heals all damage from target friendly ally. You may have your hero's remaining health become equal to the of that ally.
"The Light has seen fit to give you a second chance. Don't waste it."

name: Guise of the Stalker
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 ATK, Stealth, and Spellshield
Unseen. Unheard. Unstoppable.

name: Hammer of Sanctity
effect: Exhaust up to two target opposing heroes and/or allies. Characters exhausted this way can't ready during their controller's next ready step.
Running from paladins just means it'll be easier to fall to your knees and repent when they catch you.

name: Hands of Deceit
effect:
Target opponent chooses a number. Then you choose "higher", "equal", or "lower.

That opponent reveals his hand and discards all cards with cost higher than, equal to, or lower than the choosen cost, accordingly.
"You chose ... poorly." - Lexie Silverblade

name: Helm of Thorns
effect: (1) → Exhaust target ally with cost 2 or less.

name: Hidden Strike
effect: Reveal an ally from your hand. Your hero deals melee damage equal to that ally's ATK to target exhausted ally.
"Distraction is as much a weapon as any sword or axe."

name: High Warlord's Cleaver
effect: While your hero is attacking an hero, this weapon has +3 ATK.
"It won't bestow the title just by wielding it, but it'll damn well help you earn it." - Takara, Timewalker Warlord
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior

name: Historian's Sash
effect:
At the start of your turn, add a history counter to this armor.

Remove three history counters from this armor → You pay (1) less to complete target quest this turn.
"Our archive grows more thorough, thanks to your efforts." - Alurmi

name: Holy Ground
effect: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing ally and heals 2 damage from each friendly ally.

name: Hugh Mann
effect: Other Human allies you control have +1 / +1.
A name you can trust.

name: Hulking Helboar
effect: When this ally enters play, target ally you control has Smash this turn.
Don't bring home this bacon.

name: Ian Barus
effect: Unity: When this ally enters play, if you control three or more Human allies, target opposing ally has -3 ATK this turn.
Remorse is reserved for those who still feel the pain of life.

name: Ice Prison
effect:
Attach to target opposing ally. Draw a card.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready.
"When three walls and some bars just aren't enough, magic comes through for us in spades." - Lareth Beld, Mage Trainer

name: In Unending Numbers
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Name a race. Shuffle each ally of the named race from your graveyard into your deck, then draw a card.
"Between us and the Dragon Soul lies a legion of demons." - Nozdormu

name: Jaal
effect: → Target ally you control has Assault 3 this turn.
"The good of the Alliance must take priority over personal gain."

name: Jadefire Netherseer
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero unless its controller reveals his hand.
Many night elves followed Xavius's lead and allowed themselves to be transformed by demonic magic, taking the satyr form we know today.

name: Jadefire Soulstealer
effect: When this ally enters play, an opponent chooses one: You draw two cards; or this ally deals 5 shadow damage to that opponent's hero and heals 5 damage from your hero.
"Perhaps they were our people once. Not now. Never again." - Lord Ravencrest

name: Jarod Shadowsong
effect: Elusive, Spellshield
The brother of Maiev Shadowsong came into his own as a respected leader during the War of the Ancients.

name: Jevan Grimtotem
effect:
Smash

Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, double Jevan's ATK this turn.
Jevan, known as "Stormsong", aided Baine Bloodhoof in retaking Thunder Bluff from the rest of the treacherous Grimtotem tribe.

name: Kahul the Sunseer
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, this ally heals damage from your hero equal to that ally's , then deals unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero equal to that ally's .

name: Keening Shivarra
effect:
As an additional cost to play, discard a card.

When this ally enters play, you may put target Monster ally with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.
The zealous shivarra preach the poisonous word of the Legion to the conquered.

name: Keeper Yarashal
effect: When this ally enters play, he heals 5 damage divided as you choose from any number of target Monster heroes and/or allies.
"Allow me to ease your burden while you do us the honor of battling the Legion."

name: Kiss of Death
effect:
As an additional cost to play, remove up to five abilities in your graveyard from the game.

Weapons you control have +1 ATK this turn for each card removed this way.
"GoooodNIGHT!"

name: Klandark
effect: Bloodrush: When this ally deals combat damage while attacking for the first time each turn, if an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, ready this ally.

name: Lady Bancroft
effect: Prevent all damage that opposing heroes would deal to this ally.
"We prevailed over the Scourge, now, it is time to stand together against even greater threats."

name: Lara, Timewalker Commander
effect: This and other Human allies you control have +1 / +1 for each Human ally you control.
"Let what we've accomplished together echo throughout the timeways forever!"

name: Lava Strike
effect: Target up to two heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 2 melee damage to the first and 1 fire damage to the second.
"Recruits ask me how they can possibly dodge an axe coated in hot lava. I tell them they can start by learning to dodge an axe." - Justine Demalier, Stormwind recruiter

name: Leafbeard, Ancient of Lore
effect: When this ally enters play, if your hero is a Monster, you may exhaust target ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
"The secrets of the forest will not be revealed to these invaders!"

name: Legacy of Stormrage
effect:
Ongoing: When an ally enters play under your control, you may put X 1 / 1 Treant ally tokens into play, where X is that ally's cost.

When you play a non-Ongoing ability, you may copy it. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)
The young brothers Stormrage would eventually find themselves on wildly divergent paths.

name: Legacy of the Legion
effect:
Put a 5 / 5 Pit Lord Demon Monster ally token into play with Protector.

Put a 5 / 5 Fel Hound Demon Monster ally token into play with Ferocity.
The Burning Legion brought their cruelest and most cunning generals during their first attempt at invading Azeroth.

name: Legguards of the Legion
effect:
When this armor enters play, name "Demon", a race, or an race.

You pay (1) less to play allies of the named race, to a minimum of (1).

Your hero has Assault 1 for each ally you control of the named race.

name: Legion Fel Reaver
effect: As an additional cost to play, choose and destroy a Demon ally you control.
"The sound ... I'll never forget it for as long as I live." - Overheard in Honor Hold

name: Lexie Silverblade
effect:
Haste 2

When this ally enters play, you may destroy target ally with cost 2 or less.

name: Lions, Tigers, and Bears
effect:
Put a 2 / 2 Lion ally token into play with Ferocity.

Put a 2 / 2 Bear ally token into play with Protector.
Oh my!

name: Lord Kur'talos Ravencrest
effect: Spellshield
Commander of the Kaldorei Resistance against the Burning Legion.

name: Malorne the White Stag
effect:
(1) → Put a 1 / 1 Treant ally token into play.

(2), Exhaust two allies you control → Reveal the top card of your deck, then place it into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource.

(20) → Shuffle your graveyard into your deck, then search your deck for any number of cards and play them without paying their costs.
Father to Cenarius, consort to Elune.

name: Manaflow
effect: Draw cards equal to the highest cost among allies you control.
Many things can act as arcane amplifiers - ley lines, wands, crystals, and even companions.

name: Mark of Growth
effect:
Attach to target hero.

Ongoing: Attached hero has Mend 3.
The lumbering ancients of the forest often bestow special marks upon chosen allies, blessing them with the gifts of nature.

name: Mark of Malorne
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +3.

name: Mind Crush
effect: Target opponent chooses and destroys an ally he controls. Remove cards from the top of that player's deck from the game equal to the ATK of that destroyed ally.
"Good rule of thumb when fighting demon troops: the bigger the muscles, the weaker the mind." - Dark Cleric Beryl, Priest Trainer

name: Mo'arg Doomsmith
effect: When this ally enters play, he may deal 4 damage to another ally you control. If he does, your hero has Assault 4 this turn.
"They build to destroy in perpetuity." - Tessa Black

name: Monstrous Terrorguard
effect: When this ally enters play, you may choose and destroy another Demon ally you control. If you do, destroy target ally.
Dalaran academics still struggle to determine which head of a terrorguard is the "real" one.

name: Mossbark, Ancient of War
effect: Play this ally only if you control two or more Monster heroes and/or allies.
"I answer the cries of the trampled forest."

name: Mulgore Deathwalker
effect:
Protector

Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, this ally may deal 2 melee damage to target damaged ally.
"We still hear the Earthmother's call, however faint."

name: Mulgore Guardian
effect:
This ally can't attack.

Protector
"Like An'she, the sun, we bring light to the darkness."

name: Nalisa Nightbreeze
effect:
Elusive

When this ally enters play, target Night Elf ally you control has Spellshield
"A shot that hits a target isn't a guaranteed kill, but one that barely misses is a guaranteed distraction."

name: Neltharion the Earth-Warder
effect:
Smash

As Neltharion enters play, you may destroy five non-hero cards you control. If you do, he enters play. Otherwise, put him into his owner's graveyard. (He doesn't enter play.)
"I am the Earth-Warder. You will treat me with the reverence I deserve."

name: Netherpocalypse
effect: Each opponent chooses one: Your hero deals 10 shadow damage to his hero; or destroy all resources he controls; or destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment he controls.

name: Nightfall
effect:
Affliction Talent

Your hero deals X shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally and heals X damage from itself.
"Shadow magic at work is a wonder to behold ... entrancing even." - Tessa Black

name: Nimanda
effect: When this ally enters play, gain control of target opposing ally. You control that ally while this ally remains under your control, and that ally can attack only heroes while you control it.
Her victims can only be described as "whipped."

name: Northshire Cleric
effect: Unity: While you control three or more Human allies, damage that would be dealt by heroes and allies you control is unpreventable.
"Together, the Light will not allow us to fail."

name: Northshire Crusader
effect: Protector
"We are the shield that protects the heart of human civilization."

name: Nyala Shadefury
effect:
Elusive

Other Night Elf allies you control have Assault 2.
"Onward, sons and daughters of Elune!"

name: Opportunity
effect:
Subtlety Talent

Target an opposing hero or ally for each different cost among cards you control with cost 5, 4, 3, 2, and/or 1, starting with the highest. (You can't target the same card twice.) Your hero deals melee damage equal to that cost to that hero or ally, respectively.

name: Orgrimmar Heartstriker
effect: Bloodrush: When this ally enters play, if an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, put a 2 / 2 Orc Warrior ally token into play with Ferocity and "This ally can only attack heroes."

name: Orgrimmar Killblade
effect: Stealth
"Did you hear something?" - Many unfortunate humans

name: Orgrimmar Marksman
effect:
Ferocity

When this ally enters play, put a 2 / 2 Orc Warrior token into play with Ferocity and "This ally can attack only heroes."
"We don't call ourselves the Horde for nothing."

name: Orgrimmar Tabard
effect: (3), → Your hero deals 4 melee damage to target opposing hero. You pay (1) less to use this power for each Orc ally you control.
"Lok-tar, friend."
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Orox Darkhorn
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, you may remove the top card of target player's deck from the game.
"What's this? A mind left unprotected, a straggler from the herd?"

name: Peroth'arn
effect: At the start of your turn, an opponent chooses one: He removes the top ten cards of his deck from the game; or he chooses a hero or ally he controls, and Peroth'arn deals 10 shadow damage to it.
"No mortal may stand before me and live!"

name: Pit Lord's Destroyer
effect: When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon, if you control a Monster hero or ally, you may add a +1 ATK counter to this weapon.

name: Power Word: Tenacity
effect:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +10 .
"I believe in you. The Light has faith in you. Endure."

name: Raging Blow
effect:
Fury Talent

Your hero deals 15 melee damage to target opposing hero.
"Sometimes, there's just no room for finesse." - Nyala Shadefury

name: Rampaging Furbolg
effect: When this ally enters play, put the top two cards of target player's deck into his graveyard.
The furbolg tribes may be sapient, but they haven't lost the ferocity that comes from their progenitor, Ursoc the bear god.

name: Razor Hill Assassin
effect: When this ally enters play, target ally you control has Assault 2 and Stealth this turn.

name: Razor Hill Spiritseer
effect: Bloodrush: While an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, this ally has Assault 2.
"Speak with the elements and they'll show you your enemy's weaknesses."

name: Reckless Fireball
effect: Your hero deals 4 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally. That character's controller may discard a card from his hand. If he does, his hero deals 4 fire damage to target hero or ally of his choice.
"I know it's not technically a warning shot if you hit them with it, but ... " - Belmaril, Timewalker Bloodmage

name: Redeeming Dispel
effect: Choose one: Destroy target ability; or put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.
"The Light purifies all of you - body, mind, and soul."

name: Rhonin the Time-Lost
effect:
At the start of your turn, Rhonin may deal 1 arcane damage to target opposing hero.

If a hero or ally you control would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 for each ally you control instead.
"Use everything. Leave no defenses. This is all or nothing."

name: Ror Tramplehoof
effect: Smash
Mess with the bull, you get the bear.

name: Ruthless Execution
effect: Destroy target damaged ally. Draw a card.
"That's all for you."

name: Scalding Totem
effect:
Ongoing: At the end of your turn, add a flame counter to this Totem.

When this totem is destroyed, put a 2 / 2 Fire Elemental ally token into play for each flame counter that was on this Totem.

(6) → Destroy this Totem.

(Totems can't attack.)
"This is why we can't have ice things." - Barador, Wildhammer Timewalker

name: Scepter of Azshara
effect: At the start of your turn, you may choose a or race and destroy this weapon. If you do, destroy all allies not of that race.
"To fully prepare for a world of perfection, all the imperfect must be swept away." - Queen Azshara

name: Scheming Dreadlord
effect:
Elusive

This ally has Assault 3 while an opposing hero has 15 or more damage on it.
"That's the problem with the nathrezim - at least an infernal has the courtesy of announcing its presence." - Thalanir Dawnrise, sin'dorei scholar

name: Shadow Word: Devour
effect:
Attach to target opposing hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a death counter to this ability. Then, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero for each death counter on this ability and heals 1 damage from itself for each death counter on this ability.

name: Shadowglen Stalker
effect: Haste 2
"We will not allow these demonic fiends to infest our home."

name: Shaka Deadmark
effect: When this ally enters play, target an opposing hero. Orc allies you control have +3 ATK while in combat with that hero this turn.
"Lok-Narash! Strike now!"

name: Shandris Feathermoon
effect:
Haste 4

Ferocity

At the end of your turn, put Shandris into her owner's hand from play.

Discard another card named Shandris Feathermoon → Shandris has Long-Range and can attack two opposing heroes and/or allies at the same time this turn.
Adopted daughter of Tyrande Whisperwind.

name: Shattering Blow
effect: Destroy target equipment.
The three most important aspects of weaponry are repair, repair and repair.

name: Shield of Light
effect: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target defending ally this turn.
"No one feels he deserves it ... but the Light loves us anyway." - Uther the Lightbringer

name: SI:7 Assassin
effect: Agents of SI:7 undertake clandestine tasks for the good of Stormwind and its citizens.

name: Signet of the Timewalker
effect: At the start of your turn, add a time counter to this item. Then, if it has four or more time counters on it, destroy it. If you do, draw two cards.
"Your task is to protect the timeways in the absence of the Aspects. Do you accept this responsibility?" - Lara, Timewalker Commander

name: Sinister Watcher
effect: When this ally enters play, look at the top three cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
"Too many eyes to blind ... too many arms to disable ... can't decapitate them ..." - Nyala Shadefury

name: Skitter
effect:
Elusive

When this ally deals combat damage to a hero, add a venom counter to that hero.

At the start of your turn, destroy each opposing hero with three or more venom counters on it.
One scorpid sting is painful. Two scorpid stings are debilitating. Three scorpid stings, well ...

name: Soul Trap
effect:
As an additional cost to play, put 5 damage on your hero.

Remove target ally from the game.
Fel magic has a profound effect on the soul - both the victim's and the warlock's.

name: Soulrender Keldah
effect: When this ally attacks, choose and destroy a resource you control.
"The Horde knows all power comes at a price. What are you willing to pay?"

name: Spark of Rage
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, allies you control have +3 ATK and Smash this turn. (This also affects allies that enter play later this turn.)
It only takes a single spark to light a wildfire.

name: Spaulders of Eternity
effect: When this armor enters play, your hero has +1 ATK this turn for each ally you control.
"Examine every possibility. Analyze every ally and every enemy. You'll find a way." - Lexie Silverblade

name: Spirit Link Totem
effect:
Restoration Talent

Ongoing: When an ally you control deals damage to an opposing hero, this Totem heals that much damage from your hero.

(Totems can't attack.)

name: Spirit Shield
effect: The next time damage would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn, prevent it. For each damage prevented this way, your hero heals 1 damage from that character.
"With enough help, a spirit can emerge from the worst situations even stronger than before."

name: Stafa'jul
effect: When this ally enters play, you may put each of up to two target opposing allies with cost 3 or less into its owner's hand.
"Ya act like ya seen a ghost, mon."

name: Stalk of Corruption
effect: (6), → Your hero deals 2 shadow damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
"Drown in shadow!" - Archbishop Benedictus

name: Stella Bellamy
effect: Unity: When this ally enters play, if you control three or more Human allies, allies you control have +2 ATK this turn.
"The cavalry has arrived."

name: Stormwind Summoner
effect:
Assault 1

When this ally is destroyed, put a 1 / 1 Human Warrior ally token into play with Protector.
"Demons aren't the only thing warlocks can summon to them."

name: Stormwind Tabard
effect: (3), → Put a 1 / 1 Human Warrior ally token into play with Protector. You pay (1) less to use this power for each Human ally you control.
"King's honor, friend."
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Strife
effect:
Ongoing: Heroes have Assault 3

Damage is unpreventable.

Damage can't be healed.
Send a maniac to kill a maniac.

name: Strike
effect: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally.
"They call them combat fundamentals for a reason."

name: Strongroot, Ancient of War
effect:
This ally can protect Monster heroes and allies you control.

When an opposing ally attacks, ready this ally.
"I will not allow the Legion to befoul our home! I will surrender my life to protect it!"

name: Tabard of the Legion
effect: (3), → Look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck. You pay (1) less to use this power for each Demon ally you control.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Takara, Timewalker Warlord
effect:
Ferocity

This ally can attack only heroes.

When this ally attacks, the defending player reveals the top card of his deck. If it's an ally, he puts it into his hand.
"Uphold your vow to protect the timeways at any cost! Lok-tar ogar!"

name: Tarwila Gladespring
effect:
Elusive

→ You pay (1) less to play your next card this turn.
"Aid needn't only come in the form of blades or arrows."

name: Teldrassil Tracker
effect: Elusive
They are the shadows in the boughs.

name: Teldrassil Wildguard
effect: "We are the Druids of the Claw, the sons and daughters of the wild."

name: Tessa Black
effect: This ally's ATK and are equal to the remaining health of your hero.
"I serve my king and kingdom, even if both might disagree with my methods."

name: The Caverns of Time
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment, you may play it this turn. (Pay costs as normal.)
"We must move quickly, before any remaining Infinite agents intervene." - Nozdormu

name: The End Time
effect:
If you control eight or more resources: Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Nozdormu awaits you at the End Time, in the distant future. I can help you travel there, if you so choose." - Ziradormi

name: The Path to the Dragon Soul
effect:
Pay (1) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
"Distract Mannoroth, and the link between the Dragon Soul and the Well will be broken." - Nozdormu

name: The Vainglorious
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Your hero heals 3 damage from itself.
"Consider it a victory if you are simply able to occupy her attention, however temporarily." - Nozdormu

name: The Well of Eternity
effect:
If you control two or more allies that share a or race: Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Please follow the custodian. She will make things a bit more ... clear." - Andormu

name: Thunder Bluff Spiritwalker
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, your hero has Assault 2 this turn.
"Each living member of the tribe is its heart, each ancestor its soul."

name: Thunder Bluff Steelsnout
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
"The tribe, like the steel of our weapons and armor, must be carefully shaped and tempered for its true strength to manifest."

name: Thunder Bluff Sunwalker
effect: Protector
"We protect our tribe just as the sun protects us from the harsh winter."

name: Thunder Bluff Tabard
effect: (3), → Your hero heals 3 damage from itself. You pay (1) less to use this power for each Tauren ally you control.
"Go in peace, friend."
attributes: • Class: Death Knight, Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

name: Thunder Bluff Wildheart
effect: Tribe: When this or another Tauren ally enters play under your control, this ally heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
"The land. The tribe. All are one. We are one."

name: Tilu Plainstalker
effect: When an opposing ally with cost 4 or more attacks, this ally deals 1 ranged damage to it.
"We follow the trails of both predators and prey."

name: Timewalker Grunt
effect:
Assault 1

At the start of your turn, this ally may deal 1 melee damage to target hero for each Orc ally you control.
"Victory or death!"

name: Timewalker Guard
effect: When this ally enters play, put a 1 / 1 Human Warrior ally token into play with Protector.
"We alone were entrusted with this duty. Be diligent. Bring backup." - Virgil, Timewalker Marshal

name: Timewalker Lightsworn
effect: Unity: When you control three or more Human allies, this ally has Assault 3.
"I'm blessed by strength given to me by the Light and by my allies."

name: Timewalker Sentinel
effect:
Elusive

This ally has Assault 1 for each other Night Elf ally you control.
Most invaders are fortunate enough to deal with only a single Sentinel before they're cut down.

name: Timewalker Sunguard
effect:
Protector

This ally has +1 for each other Tauren ally you control.
"Live with honor and the ancestors will reward you."

name: Toho Bloomhorn
effect:
Protector

When this ally is destroyed, you may put him from the graveyard into his owner's resource row face down and exhausted.
"We will all join the Earthmother in time."

name: Toraan, Eye of O'ros
effect: When this ally deals combat damage to an opposing hero, you pay (1) less to play your next card this turn for each damage dealt.
"This will be a thrilling hunt ... for me."

name: Tortolla
effect:
Monster Hero Required

Protector

Other Monster heroes and allies you control have Spellshield
"After the battle, Tortolla was found underneath a mountain of demon corpses ... Then, quietly, slowly ... he asked if we had won." - Hamuul Runetotem

name: Torzuk Soulfang
effect: Spellshield
"Where steel and frost fail, the flames prevail."

name: Trickster's Edge
effect:
Dual Wield

This weapon enters play with a +1 ATK counter on it.

When your hero deals combat damage to an opposing hero with this weapon, double the number of +1 ATK counters on this weapon.

name: Trogg Earthrager
effect: When this ally enters play, target Monster hero or ally has Assault 1 this turn for this and each other Monster hero and ally you control.
"The loss of cognitive power makes this variant unacceptable to the Creators." - The Discs of Norgannon

name: Unstoppable Abyssal
effect: When this ally enters play, target opposing ally can't protect this turn.
"You remember infernals, right? From the Third War? Okay, now imagine something even worse." - Stella Bellamy on abyssals

name: Ursoc the Mighty
effect:
Ursoc can protect allies you control named Ursol the Wise.

While you control Ursoc the Mighty and Ursol the Wise, if they would deal combat damage while attacking, they deal double that much instead.
He is brother to Ursol the Wise.

name: Ursol the Wise
effect:
Ursol can protect allies you control named Ursoc the Mighty.

At the end of your turn, if you control Ursol the Wise and Ursoc the Mighty, Ursol heals all damage from both of them.
He is brother to Ursoc the Mighty.

name: Vigilant Guard
effect: Target opposing ally must attack your hero this turn if able. Draw a card.

name: Virgil, Timewalker Marshal
effect:
Protector

At the start of each opponent's turn, ready all Human allies you control.
"We'll brook no trespass in the timeways, I'll make sure of that!"

name: Void Terror
effect: Little information is available on these demons in Dalaran libraries; they appearances are infrequent, and their defeats even more so.

name: Volatile Poison
effect:
Attach to target hero that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 4 nature damage to attached hero.
"Nobody ever won a war by playing fair." - Lord Tony Romano, Rogue Trainer

name: Volatile Terrorfiend
effect: When an ally you control is destroyed for the first time on each of your turns, this ally has +3 ATK and Smash this turn.

name: Vorgo, Timewalker Stormlord
effect:
This ally enters play with X +1 / +1 counters on him.

If this ally would be dealt damage, remove that many +1 / +1 counters from him instead. Then, if none remain, destroy this ally.

Bloodrush: At the start of your turn, if an opposing hero has more damage on it than your hero, double the number of +1 / +1 counters on this ally.
"These timeways hold millennia of shamanic knowledge! Who dares challenge me?!"

name: Wand of the Demonsoul
effect: When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon, it also heals 1 damage from itself.
"No, no ... I'm looking for the Demon Soul, two words." - Tessa Black

name: Warmaul Ogre
effect: "LITTLE THINGS BENEATH MY FEET GO SQUISH!"

name: Wild Attunement
effect: Ongoing: If one or more token allies with the same type would be put into play under your control, put that many +1 into play instead.
As with any magical discipline, greater power is available to druids with focus and clarity of mind.

name: Wild Seeds
effect: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to each of up to three target allies. Put a 1 / 1 Treant ally token into play for each ally that was dealt fatal damage this way.
Even the newest druid understands that life cannot simply be created from nothing.

name: Xarantaur
effect:
Xarantaur has +1 / +1 for each card in all players' hands.

At the start of each player's turn, that player draws a card.
"I am Xarantaur the Witness, and it is my duty to preserve the true history of Azeroth, lest it be forgotten."

name: Zarim Redskull
effect: Bloodrush: When this ally enters play, if an opposing hero has more damage than your hero, exhaust target opposing ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
"Enemies of the Warchief are my concern, but never for long."

name: Zin-Ashari
effect: If an opposing hero has 15 or more damage on it: → Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
The ancient night elf capital built on the Well of Eternity, the most powerful font of magical energy Azeroth has ever known.
